div.p: Support HMS and show your Hawk Pride by purchasing your favorite gear online! Click the link above and place your order!

a.title: Go to comments for HMS Boosters Online Store

div.p: This is a guideline for lunch costs through the end of the school year 2019. Please click the link above for more info.

a.title: Go to comments for Food Program Guidelines

div.p: The Corridor School Newsletter has an updated issue. Check it out by clicking the link above!

a.title: Go to comments for The Corridor: Oct - Nov 2019

div.p: Hartley Melvin Sanborn CSD events are no longer being streamed to the The Cube! We have moved to YouTube for all event streaming. Click the link above and subscribe!

a.title: Go to comments for HMS Sports Events on YouTube!

div.script: $(document).ready(function() {CheckScript('ModuleView');CheckScript('Mustache'); });

p.em: Northwestern CollegeVOLLEYBALLand BASKETBALLCamps are nowOPENfor on-line registrations!
VOLLEYBALL--Our volleyball camps will be offered the weeks ofJune 22-26 and August 3-7.Our Team Camp will be heldJuly 31-August 1. There are a variety of camps available for girlsenteringgrades 2-12.

--The girl's basketball camps will be offeredJuly 6-8for girls enteringgrades 4-9andJuly 27-29for girls enteringgrades 5-10. We will also be offering a Team CamponJuly 9for girls enteringgrades 8-12, and we will be holding a Select Camp (invite only) onJuly 30for girls entering10-12.
--The boy's basketball camps will be offeredJuly 13-16for boys enteringgrades 5-8andJuly 20-23for boys enteringgrades 9-12.

a.title: Go to comments for Northwestern College VOLLEYBALL and BASKETBALL Camps

span.p: 2nd Annual HMS PIE Dodgeball Tournament will be held Friday, March 27, at 6:00PM Friday at the HMS High School.

Entry Fee: $50 for a team of up to 10 players
Registration Deadline is Wednesday, March 25.

a.title: Go to comments for HMS PIE Dodgeball

span.p: The HMS Music Boosters are hosting a Variety Night & Dinner in the HMS HS Event Center March 14th at 6:00PM.

Performers Wanted!
Click the link belowfor more details:

a.title: Go to comments for Variety Night Poster

span.p: Click the following link for more information: Apples for the Students
Please drop your receipts in the receipt drop box at Fiesta Foods in Hartley! Every dollar spent helps our schools receive points to go towards supplies and technology needs.

a.title: Go to comments for Apples for the Students

br.span: Buy them from the boys basketball fundraiser!! We are selling batteries from our fundraiser for boys basketball. Please use the following site

for all your battery needs. There are also other great Christmas gifts available for those hard to buy for! Please take a moment to look and purchase something to help out the boys basketball program.

a.title: Go to comments for HMS Basketball Fundraiser

span.p:
We have moved our JMC server offsite to a cloud hosted server.
This means that the old website, jmc.hartley-ms.k12.ia.us, will no longer work.
Please go to the new JMC Website:

Students:https://hms.onlinejmc.com/Student/Login.aspx
Parents:https://hms.onlinejmc.com/Parent/Login.aspx
All links on the HMS website have been updated to the new site.

a.title: Go to comments for New JMC Website
